reference.title: Questionable DES keys
reference.shortdesc: These keys are considered questionable DES keys, and so should probably not be used when entering SYM-MK or ASYM-MK master keys.

example.codeblock: 01 01 01 01 01 01 01 01 /* weak */ FE FE FE FE FE FE FE FE /* weak */ 1F 1F 1F 1F 0E 0E 0E 0E /* weak */ E0 E0 E0 E0 F1 F1 F1 F1 /* weak */ 01 FE 01 FE 01 FE 01 FE /* semi-weak */
